scripts.hardDeploy: serverless deploy && npm run deployAll && npm run deploySentiment&& npm run deployAllEvents && npm run deployAllPosts && npm run deployPageBasics
scripts.deployAll: zip -r deploy.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name code-jam-dev-load-everything --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
scripts.deploySentiment: zip -r deploy.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name code-jam-dev-get-sentiment --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
scripts.deployAllEvents: zip -r deploy.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name code-jam-dev-get-all-events --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
scripts.deployAllPosts: zip -r deploy.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name code-jam-dev-get-all-posts --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
scripts.deployPageBasics: zip -r deploy.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name code-jam-dev-get-page-basics --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
